fields.name: Provide Service (Charge 60%):
fields.value: Use during the evening phase, before results. One tenth of your target's score will be transferred to a Mafia member of your choosing, and the following night your target will be roleblocked. Additionally, you have a [your score]% chance of learning your target's alignment and subalignment at the end of the night.

fields.name: Assign Escort:
fields.value: Your target will, in addition to any other ability, roleblock their target tonight. This roleblock cannot be roleblocked.

fields.name: Manage Employees (Passive):
fields.value: As long as you are alive, any lower-scoring player attempting to roleblock (actively or passively) a Mafia player will instead be roleblocked themselves.
